Name: Pieces for JetBrains 3.3.3: Auto-Complete code from your personal snippets
Update Summary: Today marks a huge step forward in utilizing your saved snippets with the release of our new Code Auto-Complete feature in JetBrains.
MainBody:
Today marks a huge step forward in utilizing your saved snippets with the release of our new Code Auto-Complete feature in JetBrains. Instead of manually searching your snippets, Pieces intelligently suggests code completions from your personal Pieces repository as you type. To accept, just hit enter!

There are a handful of code auto-completion tools out in the wild, but we’re excited to be perhaps the first that is auto-completing from your personal snippets, not public snippets.

Together with our Auto-Save feature in Jetbrains — which automatically saves frequently used or useful snippets based on your behavior as you code — we’re excited to start to realize our vision of being the smartest, fastest AI Assistant for code snippets and screenshots.

Our internal devs have been using this feature a TON during testing by one-click saving a snippet from Chrome via the Pieces Chrome extension, and then immediately auto-completing the snippet in IntelliJ.

Try it out! Get Pieces for JetBrains here.

Support

As always, if you run into issues or have feedback, shoot us an email at support@pieces.app and we'll be in touch as soon as possible!
